metadata.title: CVE-2017-8872 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
The htmlParseTryOrFinish function in HTMLparser.c in libxml2 2.9.4 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (buffer over-read) or information disclosure.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-8872` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1
libxml2-utils - 2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1
python3-libxml2 - 2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.note: mdeslaur> fix debian used isn't the final upstream fix

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1').
